column2: OTE: The variables in this section are recoded variables that were created from one or more of the edited variables from the preceding section.
OTE: Certain source variables that were used to create recoded variables have valid values that might not have been reported or assigned for the
current survey year. However, these values have been included in the general specifications in the codebook on how the recoded variables were
<s>created. See additional details about this issue in the Organization of the Data File section of this codebook introduction.</s>
Len : 1    RC-PREGNANCY STATUS OF FEMALES AGED 12-44
Len : 1    RC-CURRENT TRIMESTER OF PREGNANCY-FEMALES AGED 12-44
MI2 was created from the variables WTPOUND2 and HTINCHE2 according to the formula of 703 times WTPOUND2 divided by the square of
